Package it.polimi.ingsw.am37.model

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am37.model.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
External class of model used to control everything and make every possible action

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager(int playersNumber, boolean advancedMode)
      Default constructor of Game Manager class. It's the main access point of the game model.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - Number of player of this instance of game
      advancedMode - Enable advanced mode or disable it

      Returns:
      the Characters that can be played.

    • prepareGame

      public void prepareGame()
      Set up the game following rules settled in the creation of the game manager: create, organize and fill the islands, the bag and the clouds list; after initialize turn manager and if rules are enabled create the characters.

    • moveStudentsToDining

      public void moveStudentsToDining(StudentsContainer container) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Move the students to the dining room of the current player
      Parameters:
      container - The students to move inside the dining room
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the container is null

    • moveStudentsToIsland

      public void moveStudentsToIsland(StudentsContainer container, int islandId) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Move the students inside the container into an island provided
      Parameters:
      container - The students to move
      islandId - The id of destination island where students are moved
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the container is null

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant(Assistant assistant) throws AssistantImpossibleToPlay, IllegalArgumentException
      Register the used assistant inside the turn manager
      Parameters:
      assistant - The assistant played
      Throws:
      AssistantImpossibleToPlay - When the assistant is impossible to play because it's not in the desk of the current player
      IllegalArgumentException - When the assistant is null

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int islandId) throws MNmovementWrongException, WinningException
      Move mother nature island by islands and activate the associated logic: checking conqueror of the island and if it is possible to unite islands
      Parameters:
      islandId - The num of forward island movement of mother nature
      Throws:
      MNmovementWrongException
      WinningException

    • calculateWinningPlayer

      public Player calculateWinningPlayer()
      returns the player which has fewer towers in the board

      Throws:
